keyword: how many calories in a hershey kiss
title: How Many Calories in a Hershey's Kiss?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Hershey's Kiss, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this classic chocolate treat.
h1: How Many Calories in a Hershey's Kiss?
assumptions: Standard milk chocolate Hershey's Kiss, approximately 4.9 g each, no wrappers or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, and manufacturer; values based on standard Hershey's milk chocolate. Check packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One Hershey's Kiss contains about 22 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dark chocolate version (less sugar, more cocoa)
With almond filling (adds nut protein and fat)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: Approximately 22 kcal per standard milk chocolate Kiss.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: About 2.6 g carbs, including 2.3 g sugars and 0.2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is there protein in Hershey's Kisses?
faqs.a: Minimal, around 0.3 g protein per Kiss from milk solids.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: 1.3 g total fat, with 0.8 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Do Hershey's Kisses have trans fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat and about 1 mg cholesterol per Kiss.
